title: Uncertainty on policy front makes predicting EV profitability tough: Rajiv Bajaj to shareholders
description: A government official later clarified that union minister for heavy industries HD Kumaraswamy “was quoted out of context” on the EV subsidy scheme. In a post on X, Kumaraswamy said the government remained "fully committed to supporting the Indian Auto Industry".
